structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Registration And Licensure; Certificate Of Registration
law.text: The committee shall register and license as an acupuncturist each applicant who proves to the satisfaction of the committee his fitness for licensure under the provisions of sections one hundred and forty-nine to one hundred and sixty-two, inclusive. It shall issue to each person registered a Certificate of Registration, which shall be prima face evidence of the right of such person to represent himself as a licensed acupuncturist and authorized to use the initials L.Ac.
